title: [Medicine] Scientist use carbon fiber in calcium phosphate bone cement to strengthen against cracks (allowing it to be used in load bearing locations) - the fibers incorporate a self-healing process where the crack is eventually healed

[Cancer] Custom nanoparticle regresses tumors when exposed to light: Researchers are collaborating on a potential new method to treat cancer by delivering a unique nanoparticle to a localized cancerous area in mice and activating the treatment through light exposure
